file.title: Consist no

p.text: command checks for any characters in the source text. If any of these characters is present in the text, the command will return "None" if none of the characters are not contained in the text, the command will be equal to the value of "Yes". For example, if the text "yvAay" to look for "pa8", the command returns "No" (ie, the text contains the character "a").

text contains
text consists
